Name: Godaddy-ddns
Overview: Docker image to provide a DDNS service for godaddy domains. Uses the GoDaddy REST API to update the given domain's DNS IP address to the public IP address of the host it is executing on. Performs a check every 10 minutes, but you can alter this if you like by modifying /etc/cron.d/godaddy-ddns inside the container.

Godaddy's API Key.Name: Godaddy's API Key
Godaddy's API Key.Default: Use the 'key' from your godaddy account
Godaddy's API Key.Description: Use the 'key' from your godaddy account

Godaddy's API Secret.Name: Godaddy's API Secret
Godaddy's API Secret.Default: Use the 'secret' from your godaddy account
Godaddy's API Secret.Description: Use the 'secret' from your godaddy account

Domain Name.Name: Domain Name
Domain Name.Description: A comma-separated list of domains that you'd like to update. For example: mydomain.com or mydomain.com,anotherdomain.com
